basics.name: Nora De la Rosa
basics.label: Senior Customer Service Advisor
basics.summary: Customer service professional with 16 years of experience in client relations, finance, and operations across multinational organizations. Skilled at analyzing client needs, ensuring service quality, and driving process improvements through SAP, EDI, and automation initiatives. Recognized as a proactive leader with strong negotiation, conflict resolution, and cross-functional collaboration skills. Committed to delivering measurable results and continuous improvement.

work.name: Klüber Lubricación Mexicana
work.summary: Led SAP migration as SD Key User, implemented automation and EDI initiatives, and managed regional customer service operations with cross-functional teams.
highlights: Key User for SAP SD migration; created user manuals and trained the Mexico team.
Led order automation, demand control (EDI), and SAP FI–SD integration with finance teams in Portugal.
Achieved 20% reduction in re-invoicing via Six Sigma White Belt project.
Coordinated exports and supported distribution accounts in Central America with freight forwarders.
Managed customer portals (SupplyOn, eBIZ, Taulia, Plexus) for orders, confirmations, and ASNs.
Oversaw quoting, order entry, invoicing, deliveries, and master data accuracy; monitored stock, lead times, and shipments; produced KPI/Orders-on-Hand reports.
work.technologies: SAP SD, SAP FI, EDI, SupplyOn, eBIZ, Taulia, Plexus, Six Sigma

work.name: Financiera Bepensa
work.summary: Managed automotive credit pipeline, partnerships, and financial analyses to drive placements.
highlights: Prospected and retained clients for automotive financing.
Built commercial relationships with dealerships to increase credit placements.
Performed financial and credit analyses for individuals and businesses.
Managed CRM pipelines, projections, and credit simulations.

work.name: Nissan - Shinyu Automotriz
work.summary: Directed financing and insurance operations, training, and negotiations to improve approvals and product penetration.
highlights: Achieved 90%+ approval rate for automotive credits.
Drove >40% penetration in financial products (warranties and insurance).
Trained and coached 20–25 sales advisors on credit processes.
Handled administrative procedures for insurance claims.
work.technologies: SIA, INTEGRA Systems, Insurance & Credit Management

work.name: Electricentro
work.position: Branch Manager / Inventory Control Project Lead
work.summary: Managed branch operations and led inventory control projects to optimize processes.

awards.title: Graduated with Honors
awards.summary: Honors distinction upon completion of Bachelor of Business Administration.
